channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rahm Emanuel critiques Democrats and offers advice for the upcoming midterms
item.description: NPR's Steve Inskeep speaks with longtime Democrat Rahm Emanuel about politics in the Trump era.

item.title: Some voters who backed Trump say ICE is going 'too far'
item.description: A new focus group of Biden-to-Trump voters weighs in on immigration operations and Trump's foreign affairs leadership on Greenland and Venezuela.

item.title: Consumer Prices Rose 2.8 Percent Through November 2025, a Sign of Sticky Inflation
item.description: The Federal Reserve’s preferred gauge for inflation in October and November was released belatedly after the government shutdown.

item.title: Trump’s Rift With Europe Is Clear. Europe Must Decide What to Do About It.
item.description: After President Trump aired his disdain for Europe, its leaders will gather in Brussels Thursday to take stock of what comes next.

item.title: Oscar Snubs and Surprises: ‘Sinners’ Makes History, ‘Wicked’ Withers
item.description: Ariana Grande, Chase Infiniti and Paul Mescal were shut out, but voters made room for Delroy Lindo, Kate Hudson and “F1.”
